SqliteMQ is a simple Sqlite3 MQ queue server

## Installation

```bash
pip install -i https://pypi.org/simple SqliteMQ
```

```commandline
pip install --upgrade -i https://pypi.org/simple SqliteMQ
```

## Usage

#### 请参考test目录下test.py文件
